entities.name: arry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is spinning around in a fire and trying to slow down.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: One of the Weasley twins, who is excitedly asking Harry if he ate something.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who has eaten some unknown substance and is now being helped up by Fred.

entities.name: george
entities.description: One of the Weasley twins, who invented a new type of toffee called Ton-Tongue Toffee.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is sitting at the table with George and two other people.

relationships.description: Fred helps Harry up from the ground after he ate something.
Harry tested George's new product, Ton-Tongue Toffee.
Fred and George are co-inventors of the Ton-Tongue Toffee.
